title: Kit
description: I've been told I got issues with authority but it's not true. As long as no one's trying to be an asshole, I'm perfectly fine.The baby-faced FBI agent shows me a picture of Sonia,and I groan. I remember how the stunning ice princess dissed me at the Sochi games, even after we both won gold. Now, I am supposed to help save her? Hell no! Rumor is, her daddy's money comes from the Russian mafia and I don't need that kind of shit, not when my own career is finally taking off.Kit is a Stand-alone Novella! No cheating, no cliff hangers, and HEA guaranteed.
author: Stella Marie Alden
